scripts.start: npm run build && npm link --force && SET DOGGER_CLI_DEV=true && dogger
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && shx cp ./package.json ./dist/metadata.json && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.swagger: shx rm -rf ./src/api/openapi && docker run --rm -e JAVA_OPTS="-Dio.swagger.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true -Dio.swagger.v3.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true" -v %cd%:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v4.2.3 generate -i https://host.docker.internal:14567/swagger/v1/swagger.json -g typescript-fetch -o src/api/openapi --additional-properties="useSingleRequestParameter=false" -o /local/src/api/openapi
